entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then mainly cloudy with periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
